players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night."
You: "Charlie is suspicious because he didn't say anything about Alice's death."
Charlie: "I was deeply saddened by Alice's sudden demise. Let us focus on finding the real culprit behind this heinous act."
Charlie: "I was shocked and devastated by Alice's death. I had no involvement in it and urge everyone to keep an open mind as we search for the true culprit."
Diana: "Charlie is lying and I think he's trying to deflect attention from himself. We should focus on investigating him further."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
